name: 學習與動作學習理論
description:
1. 瞭解「學習」的各種定義

2. 瞭解各時期學習理論、研究的典範、與學派

3. 瞭解「動作學習」(motor learning)的模式與理論
goals: 瞭解各時期學習理論、研究的典範、與學派
瞭解「動作學習」(motor learning)的模式與理論
syllabus:
一  
  
Kimble, G. A. (1961). The definition of learning. In G. A. Kimble (Rev. ed.), Hilgard and Marquis’ conditioning and learning (pp. 1-13). NY: Appletion-Century-Crofts.  
  
張民杰（2002）。美國教育學門哲學與教育博士學位授予的啟示。教育研究資訊，10（2），199-215  
  
Chapter 1 The psychology of learning, Malone (1991).  
  
  
  
二  
  
Chapter 2 Thorndike: The original connectionism; Chapter 3 Pavlov: Classical conditioning, Malone (1991).  
  
  
  
三  
  
Chapter 4 Watson: The original behaviorism; Chapter 5 Guthrie: Practical behaviorism, Malone (1991).  
  
  
  
四  
  
Chapter 6 Hull: Physical behaviorism; Chapter 7 Tolman: Cognitive behaviorism, Malone (1991).  
  
  
  
五  
  
Chapter 8 Skinner: Radical Behaviorism; Chapter 9 Advances in research, Malone (1991).  
  
  
  
六  
  
Bryan, W. L., & Harter, N. (1899). Studies on the telegraphic language: The acquisition of a hierarchy of habits. The Psychological Review, 6(4), 345-375.  
  
  
  
七  
  
Fitts, P. M. (1954). The information capacity of the human motor system in controlling the amplitude of movement. Journal of Experimental Psychology, 47(6), 381-391.  
  
  
  
八  
  
Fleishman, E. A., & Hempel, W. E. (1954). Changes in factor structure of a complex psychomotor test as a function of practice. Psychometrica, 19(3), 239-252.  
  
  
  
九  
  
Adams, J. A. (1971). A closed-loop theory of motor learning. Journal of Motor behavior, 3(2), 111-149.  
  
  
  
十  
  
Forscher, B. K. (1963). Chaos in the brickyard. Science, 142, 339.  
  
Henry, F. M., & Rogers, D. E. (1960). Increased response latency for complicated movements and a “memory drum” theory of neuromotor reaction. The Research Quarterly, 31(3), 448-453.  
  
  
  
十一  
  
Pew, R. W. (1970). Toward a process-oriented theory of human skilled performance. Journal of Motor behavior, 2(1), 8-24.  
  
  
  
十二  
  
Schmidt, R. A. (1975). A schema theory of discrete motor skill learning. Psychological Review, 82, 225-260.  
  
  
  
十三  
  
Newell, K. M., & McDonald, P. V. (1992). Searching for solutions to the coordination function: Learning as exploratory behavior. In G. E. Stelmach & J. Requin (Eds.), Tutorials in motor behavior II (pp. 517-531). Amsterdam: Elsevier Science.  
  
  
  
十四  
  
Newell, K. M. (1986b). Constraints on the development of coordination. In M. G. Wade & H. T. A. Whiting (Eds.), Motor development in children: Aspects of coordination and control (pp. 341-360). Boston: Martinus Nijhoff.  
  
  
  
十五  
  
Abernethy, B., & Sparrow, W. A. (1992). The rise and the fall of dominant paradigms in motor behavior research. In J. J. Summers (Ed.), Approaches to the study of motor control and learning (pp. 3-45). Amsterdam: North-Holland.  
  
  
  
十六  
  
Proposal idea discussion I  
  
  
  
十七  
  
Proposal idea discussion II  
  
  
  
十八  
  
Proposal presentation
